title: Women’s Suffrage in UK
subtitle: Women gain voting rights in the UK

title: 19th Amendment
subtitle: Grants women voting rights in the US

title: Chanel No. 5 Launches
subtitle: First abstract, modern perfume marketed to independent women

title: The Society for Human Rights is founded by Henry Gerber in Chicago.
subtitle: The society becomes the first documented gay rights organization in America, publishing the first U.S. publication for homosexuals. It soon disbands under political pressure.

title: Lavender Scare Begins
subtitle: U.S. government labels homosexuals as security risks and purges employees

title: Mattachine Society Founded
subtitle: America's first national gay rights group formed in LA to fight discrimination

title: Executive Order 10450
subtitle: Eisenhower bans homosexuals from federal jobs, labeling them security risks

title: Daughters of Bilitis Founded
subtitle: First U.S. lesbian rights group offers safer social spaces amid police raids

title: Illinois Decriminalizes Homosexuality
subtitle: First U.S. state to repeal sodomy laws

title: Equal Pay Act
subtitle: In the US prohibits wage discrimination based on sex

title: Stonewall Riots
subtitle: Police raid sparks days of protest, igniting the modern LGBT rights movement

title: First Gay Pride Parade
subtitle: Thousands march in NYC on the anniversary of Stonewall

title: Title IX
subtitle: Prohibits sex discrimination in federally funded education programs

title: Roe v. Wade
subtitle: Establishes abortion rights in the US

title: APA Delists Homosexuality
subtitle: Homosexuality removed from APA’s list of mental disorders

title: International Women's Year
subtitle: UN holds the First World Conference on Women in Mexico City

title: CEDAW Adopted
subtitle: UN adopts the Convention on the Elimination of Discrimination Against Women

title: Sandra Day O’Connor Appointed
subtitle: First woman on the U.S. Supreme Court. Breaks a monumental barrier.

title: Calvin Klein launches CK One
subtitle: The first mainstream fragrance explicitly marketed as unisex, becoming a cultural phenomenon and selling over $90 million in its first year

title: Netherlands Legalizes Same-Sex Marriage
subtitle: First country in the world to do so

title: Massachusetts becomes the first state to legalize gay marriage.
subtitle: The court finds the prohibition of gay marriage unconstitutional because it denies dignity and equality of all individuals.

title: Le Labo Founded
subtitle: Gender-free scent naming (e.g. Santal 33) becomes cult hit with all genders

title: Same-Sex Marriage Legalized
subtitle: Legalized across all 59 state in the US (Obergefell v. Hodges)

title: #MeToo Movement Goes Global
subtitle: Massive reckoning against sexual harassment and abuse

title: Bostock v. Clayton County
subtitle: US Supreme Court rules Title VII covers LGBTQ+ workplace protections
